sentences.english: The use of dogs in warfare dates back to the late antiquity of the Greco-Roman world.

sentences.english: The Chinese characters are all most the Picto-phonetic characters in the latest ancient.
sentences.chinese: 中国文字在近古期以后，几乎完全是形声字。
